a card is given to celebrate a special occasion .

with their fingers interlaces | the love is being shown .

output.sentences: A normal morning starts as the couple eats their breakfast.
This is no normal day, however, there is a special occasion to celebrate!
The romantic couple poses for pictures.
And their love is clearly shown in the way their fingers interlace.
They are now ready to start this happy day!
